repnme.cdata!:
Colombia - Second Development Finance
            Companies Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Development Finance Companies
            Project will provide financing of development in Colombia
            through credits and other investments for productive
            purposes to privately controlled enterprises, for specific
            projects. The bank loan will cover the direct foreign
            exchange cost of projects.
